name: Carbonara
imgAlt: Classic Italian pasta with creamy egg sauce and pancetta
instructions: Cook pasta in salted boiling water until al dente.
Meanwhile, crisp pancetta in a large pan over medium heat.
Whisk egg yolks, whole egg, and cheese together in a bowl.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain pasta.
Remove pan from heat, add pasta to pancetta.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create creamy sauce.
Season generously with black pepper and serve immediately.
